name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A New Tab, A New Song

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension uses the Spotify API to recommend a new song from your favourite artist everytime you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy a new wallpaper on every Chrome new tab based on a random song cover image of the artist/band of your choice.
You can choose any artist found on Spotify by clicking on the button in the top-left corner.
If you click on the cover image of the song it will redirect you to Spotify to listen to it.
